front.title: Network Service Header (NSH) Context Header Allocation (Network Security)

abstract.t: This document provides a recommended default allocation of the mandatory fixed context headers for a Network Service Header (NSH) relevant to Service Function Chaining (SFC) for network security Service Functions. NSH is defined in [I-D.ietf-sfc-nsh]. This allocation is intended to support the use cased described in [I-D.wang-sfc-ns-use-cases].
